Class GLScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.coffeeshopstudio.icegl.gl.GLScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IControlManager

    public abstract class GLScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements IControlManager
    Abstract Renderer that each screens screen is based on
